name: Time Off
description:
Submitted for the 32-bit holiday game jam

Welcome! You are the boss of floor 4 of an indeterminate 90s company, and it is nearing the Holidays. Your employees each want a holiday, and it is up to you to decide if they deserve one, based off their excuse, the amount of days they want and how productive they are. Be careful not to let the company money drop to 0 or your employee happiness drop to 0, or there will be consequences. GOOD LUCK!

Click the question mark note on the wall for help when you first start, and please don't spam the buttons! 

Music: Yoisho
Coding: Swedishfeetballs
Art: Wlqwos
